question: Which among the following is referred to as Hunar Haat?
option1: An exhibition of handicrafts and traditional products
option2: A team of cultural music artist
option3: An organization of classical artist forum
answer: An exhibition of handicrafts and traditional products
explanation: Hunar Haat is the exhibition of handicrafts and traditional products. It was organized in Prayagraj (UP) in the month of November 2019. It acts like an “Empowerment Exchange” of artisans and craftsmen. The organizer of the event is the Ministry of Minority Affairs.
